items.content_html: LocalLingo is a lightweight web app that helps users identify the dialect of a given audio or text snippet (e.g., Tamil vs. Telugu) and provides basic language tutoring. Upload a short clip or enter text, and LocalLingo will detect the language, transcribe it (if audio), and offer beginner-friendly phrases, pronunciation tips, and mini lessons.

Upload a short clip or enter text, and LocalLingo will detect the language, transcribe it (if audio), and offer beginner-friendly phrases, pronunciation tips, and mini lessons.
